mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.loan_product_code ,t.loan_product_name ,t.loan_bank
,t.gps_fee ,t.auth_fee ,t.bank_fee ,t.company_fee ,t.credit_code
,t.biz_type ,t.loan_period ,t.invoice_company ,t.car_brand ,t.car_series ,t.car_model ,t.car_pic ,t.car_hgz_pic ,t.car_hgz_no ,t.car_frame_no ,t.car_engine_no ,t.original_price
,t.invoice_price ,t.car_color ,t.month_deposit ,t.first_amount ,t.first_rate
,t.loan_amount ,t.settle_address ,t.apply_user_id ,t.apply_user_name ,t.gender
,t.marry_state ,t.nation ,t.education ,t.id_kind ,t.id_no
,t.family_number ,t.mobile ,t.now_address ,t.post_code1 ,t.residence_address
,t.post_code2 ,t.family_main_asset ,t.main_asset_include ,t.main_income ,t.work_company_name
,t.work_company_address ,t.work_company_property ,t.work_belong_industry ,t.work_profession ,t.work_datetime ,t.self_company_area ,t.employee_quantity ,t.enterprise_month_output ,t.position
,t.post_title ,t.month_income
,t.mate_zfb_jour_datetime_start ,t.mate_zfb_jour_datetime_end ,t.mate_zfb_jour_income ,t.mate_zfb_jour_expend ,t.mate_zfb_jour_balance ,t.mate_zfb_jour_month_income ,t.mate_zfb_jour_month_expend ,t.mate_zfb_jour_month_expend ,t.mate_zfb_jour_pic ,t.mate_zfb_jour_remark
,t.mate_wx_jour_datetime_start ,t.mate_wx_jour_datetime_end ,t.mate_wx_jour_income ,t.mate_wx_jour_expend ,t.mate_wx_jour_balance ,t.mate_wx_jour_month_income ,t.mate_wx_jour_month_expend ,t.mate_wx_jour_pic ,t.mate_wx_jour_remark
,t.mate_jour_datetime_start ,t.mate_jour_datetime_end ,t.mate_jour_income ,t.mate_jour_expend ,t.mate_jour_balance ,t.mate_jour_month_income ,t.mate_jour_month_expend ,t.mate_jour_pic ,t.mate_jour_remark ,t.mate_asset_pdf
,t.mate_name ,t.mate_mobile ,t.mate_id_no
,t.mate_education ,t.mate_company_name ,t.mate_company_address ,t.mate_company_contact_no ,t.gua_name
,t.gua_mobile ,t.gua_id_no ,t.gua_phone ,t.gua_company_name ,t.gua_company_address ,t.gua_house_asset_address
,t.gua_zfb_jour_datetime_start ,t.gua_zfb_jour_datetime_end ,t.gua_zfb_jour_income ,t.gua_zfb_jour_expend ,t.gua_zfb_jour_balance ,t.gua_zfb_jour_month_income ,t.gua_zfb_jour_month_expend ,t.gua_zfb_jour_pic ,t.gua_zfb_jour_remark
,t.gua_wx_jour_datetime_start ,t.gua_wx_jour_datetime_end ,t.gua_wx_jour_income ,t.gua_wx_jour_expend ,t.gua_wx_jour_balance ,t.gua_wx_jour_month_income ,t.gua_wx_jour_month_expend ,t.gua_wx_jour_pic ,t.gua_wx_jour_remark
,t.gua_jour_datetime_start ,t.gua_jour_datetime_end ,t.gua_jour_income ,t.gua_jour_expend ,t.gua_jour_balance ,t.gua_jour_month_income ,t.gua_jour_month_expend ,t.gua_jour_pic ,t.gua_jour_remark ,t.gua_asset_pdf
,t.emergency_name1 ,t.emergency_relation1 ,t.emergency_mobile1 ,t.emergency_name2
,t.emergency_relation2 ,t.emergency_mobile2
,t.zfb_jour_datetime_start ,t.zfb_jour_datetime_end ,t.zfb_jour_income ,t.zfb_jour_expend ,t.zfb_jour_balance ,t.zfb_jour_month_income ,t.zfb_jour_month_expend ,t.zfb_jour_pic ,t.zfb_jour_remark
,t.wx_jour_datetime_start ,t.wx_jour_datetime_end ,t.wx_jour_income ,t.wx_jour_expend ,t.wx_jour_balance ,t.wx_jour_month_income ,t.wx_jour_month_expend ,t.wx_jour_pic ,t.wx_jour_remark
,t.jour_datetime_start ,t.jour_datetime_end ,t.jour_income ,t.jour_expend ,t.jour_balance ,t.jour_month_income ,t.jour_month_expend ,t.jour_pic ,t.jour_remark ,t.asset_pdf
,t.house_contract ,t.house_picture ,t.is_advance_fund ,t.interview_video ,t.interview_contract
,t.advance_fund_datetime ,t.advance_fund_amount ,t.bill_pdf ,t.car_settle_datetime ,t.car_number
,t.car_invoice ,t.car_hgz ,t.car_jqx ,t.car_syx ,t.car_regcerti
,t.car_pd ,t.car_key ,t.car_big_smj ,t.bank_commit_datetime ,t.bank_commit_note
,t.repay_bank_code ,t.repay_bank_name ,t.repay_subbranch ,t.repay_bankcard_number ,t.repay_bill_date
,t.repay_bank_date ,t.repay_company_date ,t.repay_first_month_amount ,t.repay_first_month_datetime ,t.repay_month_amount
,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.receipt_bank_code ,t.receipt_bank_name ,t.receipt_bankcard_number ,t.receipt_pdf
,t.receipt_remark ,t.pledge_datetime ,t.green_big_smj ,t.pledge_bank_commit_datetime ,t.pledge_bank_commit_note
,t.enter_location ,t.sale_user_id ,t.company_code ,t.apply_datetime ,t.cur_node_code
,t.remark ,t.team_code ,t.back_advance_status FROM tdq_budget_order t
t.${order}

SELECT t.code ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.loan_product_code ,t.loan_product_name ,t.loan_bank
,t.gps_fee ,t.auth_fee ,t.bank_fee ,t.company_fee ,t.credit_code
,t.biz_type ,t.loan_period ,t.invoice_company ,t.car_brand ,t.car_series ,t.car_model ,t.car_pic ,t.car_hgz_pic ,t.car_hgz_no ,t.car_frame_no ,t.car_engine_no ,t.original_price
,t.invoice_price ,t.car_color ,t.month_deposit ,t.first_amount ,t.first_rate
,t.loan_amount ,t.settle_address ,t.apply_user_id ,t.apply_user_name ,t.gender
,t.id_kind ,t.id_no ,t.mobile ,t.car_number ,t.car_invoice
,t.repay_bank_code ,t.repay_bank_name ,t.repay_subbranch ,t.repay_bankcard_number ,t.repay_bill_date
,t.repay_bank_date ,t.repay_company_date ,t.repay_first_month_amount ,t.repay_first_month_datetime ,t.repay_month_amount
,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.is_advance_fund ,t.sale_user_id ,t.company_code ,t.apply_datetime
,t.cur_node_code ,t.remark ,t.team_code ,t.back_advance_status FROM tdq_budget_order t
t.${order}

SELECT distinct t.code ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.loan_product_code ,t.loan_product_name ,t.loan_bank
,t.gps_fee ,t.auth_fee ,t.bank_fee ,t.company_fee ,t.credit_code
,t.biz_type ,t.loan_period ,t.invoice_company ,t.car_brand ,t.car_series ,t.car_model ,t.car_pic ,t.car_hgz_pic ,t.car_hgz_no ,t.car_frame_no ,t.car_engine_no ,t.original_price
,t.invoice_price ,t.car_color ,t.month_deposit ,t.first_amount ,t.first_rate
,t.loan_amount ,t.settle_address ,t.apply_user_id ,t.apply_user_name ,t.gender
,t.id_kind ,t.id_no ,t.mobile ,t.car_number ,t.car_invoice
,t.repay_bank_code ,t.repay_bank_name ,t.repay_subbranch ,t.repay_bankcard_number ,t.repay_bill_date
,t.repay_bank_date ,t.repay_company_date ,t.repay_first_month_amount ,t.repay_first_month_datetime ,t.repay_month_amount
,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.is_advance_fund ,t.sale_user_id ,t.company_code ,t.apply_datetime
,t.cur_node_code ,t.remark ,t.team_code ,t.back_advance_status FROM tdq_budget_order t left join tsys_role_node trn on t.cur_node_code = trn.node_code
t.${order}
SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT distinct code FROM tdq_budget_order t left join tsys_role_node trn on t.cur_node_code = trn.node_code ) tb
